description: Any language that promotes violence or discrimination against individuals or groups based on their race, ethnicity, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, or other protected characteristics is strictly prohibited.
Posting nudity or pornography is not allowed.

rule: No posting personal information about others without their consent
description: Sharing others' addresses, phone numbers, social security numbers, or other personal information without their consent is prohibited.
Scams, phishing attempts, and deceptive advertising are not allowed.
Cyberbullying or targeted harassment is strictly prohibited.
Promoting or glorifying illegal activities such as drug use or terrorism is not allowed.

rule: No posting of copyrighted material without permission
description: Posting copyrighted material without permission is not allowed.
Posting content that contains graphic violence or gore is prohibited.

rule: No spreading false or misleading information
description: Posting misinformation about public health or safety is not allowed.
Encouraging self-harm or suicide is strictly prohibited.
